Package scraper.templatescraper

Class ArticleTemplate

java.lang.Object
scraper.templatescraper.TemplateScraper
scraper.templatescraper.ArticleTemplate
Direct Known Subclasses:
SnlArticleTemplate
public abstract class ArticleTemplate
extends TemplateScraper
Represents an article template.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Vetle Jahr

  • Constructor Details

    • ArticleTemplate

      public ArticleTemplate()

  • Method Details

    • getHeader

      public java.lang.String getHeader()
      Gets the header of the article. The default method will return the first H1 element. If there is no H1 element, the method will return null. Method should be overriden if the header is not the first H1 element.
      Returns:
      header of the article

    • getIntroduction

      public abstract java.lang.String getIntroduction()
      Gets the introduction of the article.
      Returns:
      introduction of the article

    • getParagraphs

      public java.util.ArrayList<HtmlElement> getParagraphs()
      Gets the paragraphs of the article as an arraylist of HtmlElement. Default implementation will return all p elements. Method should be overriden if the paragraphs are not all p elements.
      Returns:
      paragraphs of the article

    • getTextContentWithHeaders

      public abstract java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getTextContentWithHeaders()
      Gets the text content of the article as a hashmap with the header as key and the text as value.
      Returns:
      text content of the article

    • getWriters

      public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getWriters()
      Gets the writers of the article.
      Returns:
      writers of the article

    • getDatePublished

      public abstract java.time.LocalDate getDatePublished()
      Gets the date the article was published. Similar to getDateTimePublished() but returns only the date as a LocalDate object.
      Returns:
      date the article was published

    • getDateTimePublished

      public abstract java.time.LocalDateTime getDateTimePublished()
      Gets the date and time the article was published. Similar to getDatePublished() but returns the date and time as a LocalDateTime object.
      Returns:
      date and time the article was published

    • getDateLastUpdated

      public abstract java.time.LocalDate getDateLastUpdated()
      Gets the date the article was last updated. Similar to getDateTimeLastUpdated() but returns only the date as a LocalDate object.
      Returns:
      date the article was last updated

    • getDateTimeLastUpdated

      public abstract java.time.LocalDateTime getDateTimeLastUpdated()
      Gets the date and time the article was last updated. Similar to getDateLastUpdated() but returns the date and time as a LocalDateTime object.
      Returns:
      date and time the article was last updated
